text: @kayleighmcenany @realDonaldTrump So some Math, Kayleigh - if this was COVID-19 you can multiply those results by 20-30 times. Trump can’t control infection rates so 60 million cases would result in 373830 dead. I think you are crowing about outcomes before you even know the results. Good luck with that.
